ygData.subject: Re: Intro & Advice Request
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually that advice is only true at level 5.  Before that level you lose no xp - and actually gain since you resupply food and water... Slyde ... From: Fun
ygData.messageBody:
Actually that advice is only true at level 5. Before that level you lose no
xp - and actually gain since you resupply food and water...

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: Fun Bob <fun-bob@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 1:05 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Intro & Advice Request


> From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
>
> The best advice I can give you is really simple and just plain common
sense.
> Dont die. Dying really sucks, especially when you die so many times, you
> realize if you hadnt died, you could be like 4 or 5 levels higher than you
> are.
> Rolande. = )
> -----Original Message-----
